query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS applications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  job_id INT NOT NULL,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'reviewed', 'shortlisted', 'interview', 'offered', 'accepted', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  cover_letter TEXT,
  resume_url TEXT,
  match_score INT,
  screening_score INT,
  overall_rating INT,
  review_notes TEXT,
  reviewed_by INT,
  reviewed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status_history JSON,
  applied_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_job_id (job_id),
  INDEX idx_candidate_id (candidate_id),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_applied_at (applied_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS applications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  job_id INT NOT NULL,
  candidate_id INT NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending', 'reviewed', 'shortlisted', 'interview', 'offered', 'accepted', 'rejected') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  cover_letter TEXT,
  resume_url TEXT,
  match_score INT,
  screening_score INT,
  overall_rating INT,
  review_notes TEXT,
  reviewed_by INT,
  reviewed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  status_history JSON,
  applied_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_job_id (job_id),
  INDEX idx_candidate_id (candidate_id),
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_applied_at (applied_at)
)
